title: Ticket #922: download-install shouldn't die with a stack trace if release is disabl
description:
For example: 
[release 7.4]
table:        _release_defaults
type:         stable
state:        disabled
dirstring:    7/7.4
install_url:  http://www.cs.wisc.edu/condor/manual/v7.4/3_2Installation.html
license_url:  http://www.cs.wisc.edu/condor/license.html

run like this: 

download-install -v --mode symlink 7.4.0 /p/condor/public/binaries/v7.4/7.4.0

Produces this: 

Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/p/condor/home/bin/download-install", line 522, in <module>
    main( )
  File "/p/condor/home/bin/download-install", line 383, in main
    create=settings.Exec() )
  File "/afs/cs.wisc.edu/p/condor/downloads/bin/download_dirs.py", line 40, in RealDir
    self.VerifyRelease( release )
  File "/afs/cs.wisc.edu/p/condor/downloads/bin/download_dirs.py", line 37, in VerifyRelease
    assert 0
AssertionError
creator: nleroy
